00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <cmath>
00003 using namespace std;
00004 
00005 int main(){
00006         string input;
00007         cout<<"Silahkan masukkan ekspresi"<<endl;
00008         std::getline(std::cin,input);
00009         int Exit = 0;
00010         int ArabnLogika = 0;
00011         while(input != "exit")
00012         {
00013                 Exit = 0;
00014                 ArabnLogika = 0;
00015                 while(input.length() != 0 && Exit==0)
00016                 {
00017                         if(input[0] == '~' || input[0] == '&' || input[0] == '|')
00018                         {
00019                                 cout<<"Logika"<<endl;
00020                                 ArabnLogika = 0;
00021                                 Exit = 1;
00022                         }
00023                         else if(input[0] == 'M' || input[0] == 'D' || input[0] == 'C' || input[0] == 'L' || input[0] == 'X'|| input[0] == 'V'|| input[0] == 'I')
00024                         {
00025                                 cout<<"Romawi"<<endl;
00026                                 ArabnLogika = 0;
00027                                 Exit = 1;
00028                         }
00029                         else if(input[0] == '+' || input[0] == '-' || input[0] == '*' || input[0] == ':' || input[0] == '/' || input[0] == '%')
00030                         {
00031                                 cout<<"Arab"<<endl;
00032                                 ArabnLogika = 0;
00033                                 Exit = 1;
00034                         }
00035                         else if(input[0] == '0' || input[0] == '1')
00036                         {
00037                                 if(input.length() > 1)
00038                                 {
00039                                         if(input[1] == '0' || input[1] == '1')
00040                                         {
00041                                                 ArabnLogika = 0;
00042                                                 cout<<"Romawi"<<endl;
00043                                         }
00044                                         else
00045                                         {
00046                                                 ArabnLogika = 1;
00047                                         }
00048                                 }
00049                                 else
00050                                 {
00051                                         ArabnLogika = 1;
00052                                 }                               
00053                         }
00054                         else if( input[0] == '2' || input[0] == '3' || input[0] == '4' || input[0] == '5'
00055                                 || input[0] == '6'|| input[0] == '7' || input[0] == '8' || input[0] == '9')
00056                         {
00057                                 cout<<"Logika"<<endl;
00058                         }
00059                         input.erase(0,1);
00060                 }
00061                 if(ArabnLogika == 1)
00062                 {
00063                         cout<<"Bisa logika dan romawi"<<endl;
00064                 }
00065                 cout<<"Silahkan masukkan ekspresi"<<endl;
00066                 std::getline(std::cin,input);
00067         }       
00068         return 0;
00069 }
